title: Legal Temporal Reasoning Benchmark
summary: Benchmarking LLMs (GPT, Claude, Gemini, Llama, Mistral, Qwen) on UK & GDPR temporal reasoning with 12 task types; data pipelines in Python; visualized insights for 6 research questions.

title: Deepfake Detection Model
summary: Multi-class facial deepfake classifier (real/deepfake/faceswap) using ResNet variants; FaceForensics++; Python GUI for inference.

title: AirVia Air Ticket Sales
summary: Java + MySQL desktop system for ticket sales, reporting, and UI via Swing; group project (developer role).
